data.title: publications
data.text:
Welcome to Yubing's publications!

.

Link for publications on NCBI:

http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/myncbi/browse/collection/47326897/?sort=date&direction=ascending

Google cites:

https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=2JmiMCEAAAAJ&hl=en

News of 2021

1. Jieyu Li, Jayaram K. Udupa, Yubing Tong, Lisheng Wang, Drew A. Torigian. Segmentation Evaluation with Sparse Ground Truth Data: Simulating True Segmentations as Perfect/Imperfect as Those Generated by Humans. Medical Image Analysis, 2021 (pdf).

2. You Hao, Jayaram K. Udupa, Yubing Tonget al. " OFx: A method of 4D image construction from free-breathing non-gated MRI slice acquisitions of the thorax via optical flux", Medical Image Analysis 72 (2021) 102088 (pdf).

3. Xu G, Cao H, Udupa JK, Tong Y, Torigian DA. DiSegNet: A Deep Dilated Convolutional Encoder-Decoder Architecture for Lymph Node Segmentation on PET/CT images, CMIG 88 (2021) 10185, 2021 (pdf).

4. Lipeng Xie, Jayaram K Udupa, Yubing Tong, Drew A Torigian, Zihan Huang, Rachel M Kogan, Jennifer Ben Nathan, David Wootton, Kokren Choy, Sanghun Sin, Mark E Wagshul, Raanan Arens. Automatic upper airway segmentation in static and dynamic MRI via deep convolutional neural networks. SPIE 2021, Medical Imaging.

5. Jieyu Li, Jayaram K Udupa, Yubing Tong, Dewey Odhner, Drew A Torigian. Anatomy recognition in CT images of head and neck region via precision atlases, SPIE 2021, Medical Imaging.

6. Yubing Tong, Jayaram K Udupa, Joseph M McDonough, Carina Lott, Caiyun Wu, Chamith S Rajapakse, Jason B Anari, Drew A Torigian, Patrick J Cahill. Lung parenchymal characterization via thoracic dynamic MRI in normal children and pediatric patients with TIS, SPIE 2021, Medical Imaging.

7. You Hao, Jayaram K Udupa, Yubing Tong, Caiyun Wu, Hua Li, Joseph M McDonough, Carina Lott, Jason B Anari, Drew A Torigian, Patrick J Cahill. Estimation of the dynamic volume of each lung via rapid limited-slice dynamic MRI, SPIE 2021, Medical Imaging.

8. D Wootton, KR Choy, S Sin, Y Tong, JK Udupa, ME Wagshul, R Arens. Airway Effective Compliance Measurement by Image-Based CFD During Hypopnea, Recovery, and Normal Breaths, TP131. TP131 NOVEL METHODOLOGIES FOR DIAGNOSING SLEEP DISORDERED BREATHING.

2020:

Russel A Hibbs best science paper award in Scoliosis Research Society (SRS) 55th Annual Meeting, online, Sep. 9 - Sep. 13, 2020.

A Novel Imaging Study to Quantify Respiratory Function in Early Onset Scoliosis-Introducing Quantitative Dynamic Magnetic Resonance Imaging (QdMRI). Yubing Tong, PhD; Jayaram K. Udupa, PhD; Joseph M. McDonough, MS; Caiyun Wu, MS; Catherine Qiu, MS; Carina Lott, MS; Nirupa Galagedera, BA; Jason B. Anari, MD; Drew A. Torigian, MA; Patrick J. Cahill, MD, Best Basic Science paper in Scoliosis Research Society (SRS) 55th Annual Meeting online, Sep. 9 - Sep. 13, 2020.

Best science paper award in 14th International Congress on Early Onset Scoliosis (2020 ICEOS Virtual Meeting), November 14, 2020.

Rib-based Anchors do not Impair Chest Wall Motion in Early Onset Scoliosis, Yubing Tong, Jayaram K. Udupa, Joseph M. McDonough, Caiyun Wu, Catherine Qiu, Carina Lott, Nirupa Galagedera, Jason B. Anari, Drew A. Torigian, Patrick J. Cahill, 14th International Congress on Early Onset Scoliosis (2020 ICEOS Virtual Meeting), November 14, 2020.

Journal papers

Thoracic quantitative dynamic MRI to understand developmental changes in normal ventilatory dynamics. Chest. 2020. doi: 10.1016/j.chest.2020.07.066. PubMed PMID: 32768456 ( download pdf ).

2. Agrawal V, Udupa JK, Tong Y, Torigian DA. BRR‐Net: A Tandem Architectural CNN‐ RNN for Automatic Body Region Localization in CT Images, Medical Physics, https://doi.org/10.1002/mp.14439 (download pdf).

Ann Am Thorac Soc. 2020. doi: 10.1513/AnnalsATS.202003-247OC. PubMed PMID: 32530703 (download pdf).

4. Li J, Udupa JK, Tong Y, Wang L, Torigian DA. LinSEM: Linearizing segmentation evaluation metrics for medical images. Med Image Anal. 2020;60:101601. doi: 10.1016/j.media.2019.101601. PubMed PMID: 31811980; PMCID: PMC6980787 (download pdf ).

5. Xu G, Udupa JK, Tong Y, Odhner D, Cao H, Torigian DA. AAR-LN-DQ: Automatic anatomy recognition based disease quantification in thoracic lymph node zones via FDG PET/CT images without Nodal Delineation. Med Phys. 2020;47(8):3467-84. doi: 10.1002/mp.14240. PubMed PMID: 32418221 (download pdf ).

6. Bitners AC, Sin S, Agrawal S, Lee S, Udupa JK, Tong Y, Wootton DM, Choy KR, Wagshul ME, Arens R. Effect of Sleep on Upper Airway Dynamics in Obese Children with Obstructive Sleep Apnea Syndrome. Sleep. 2020. doi: 10.1093/sleep/zsaa071. PubMed PMID: 32280981 (download pdf).

7. Liu T, Pan J, Torigian DA, Xu P, Miao Q, Tong Y, Udupa JK. ABCNet: A new efficient 3D dense-structure network for segmentation and analysis of body tissue composition on body-torso-wide CT images. Med Phys. 2020;47(7):2986-99. doi: 10.1002/mp.14141. PubMed PMID: 32170754 (download pdf).

8. Udupa JK, Tong Y, Capraro A, McDonough JM, Mayer OH, Ho S, Wileyto P, Torigian DA, Campbell RM, Jr. Understanding Respiratory Restrictions as a Function of the Scoliotic Spinal Curve in Thoracic Insufficiency Syndrome: A 4D Dynamic MR Imaging Study. J Pediatr Orthop. 2020;40(4):183-9. doi: 10.1097/BPO.0000000000001258. PubMed PMID: 32132448; PMCID: PMC6426694.

9. Tong Y, Udupa JK, McDonough JM, Wileyto EP, Capraro A, Wu C, Ho S, Galagedera N, Talwar D, Mayer OH, Torigian DA, Campbell RM. Quantitative Dynamic Thoracic MRI: Application to Thoracic Insufficiency Syndrome in Pediatric Patients. Radiology. 2019;292(1):206-13. doi: 10.1148/radiol.2019181731. PubMed PMID: 31112090. (This paper is also requested to be reprinted in another journal Spine Deformity for benefiting readers in SRS field (Scoliosis Research Society) after receiving the best science paper award from SRS, 2020).

10.Changjian Sun, Yubing Tong, Jayaram K Udupa*. Auto-labeling of respiratory time points in free-breathing thoracic dynamic MR image acquisitions for 4D image construction, (Submitted for IEEE TBME, co-first authorship, and co-mentor for the PhD student, Changjian Sun).

.

Abstract:

1. A Novel Imaging Study to Quantify Respiratory Function in Early Onset Scoliosis-Introducing Quantitative Dynamic Magnetic Resonance Imaging (QdMRI) Yubing Tong, PhD; Jayaram K. Udupa, PhD; Joseph M. McDonough, MS; Caiyun Wu, MS; Catherine Qiu, MS; Carina Lott, MS; Nirupa Galagedera, BA; Jason B. Anari, MD; Drew A. Torigian, MA; Patrick J. Cahill, MD, Best Basic Science paper in Scoliosis Research Society (SRS) 55th Annual Meeting online, Sep. 9 - Sep. 13, 2020.

2. Pulmonary Hypertension (PH) and Thoracic Cage Function in Patients with Early Onset Scoliosis: Assessment with Quantitative Dynamic Magnetic Resonance Imaging (QdMRI) Yubing Tong, PhD; Jayaram K. Udupa, PhD; Joseph M. McDonough, MS; Caiyun Wu, MS; Catherine Qiu, MS; Carina Lott, MS; Nirupa Galagedera, BA; Catherine M. Avitabile, MD; Jason B. Anari, MD; Drew A. Torigian, MA; Patrick J. Cahill, MD, Scoliosis Research Society (SRS) 55th Annual Meeting online, Sep. 9 - Sep. 13, 2020.

3. Rib-based Anchors do not Impair Chest Wall Motion in Early Onset Scoliosis, Yubing Tong, PhD; Jayaram K. Udupa, PhD; Joseph M. McDonough, MS; Caiyun Wu, MS; Catherine Qiu, MS; Carina Lott, MS; Nirupa Galagedera, BA; Jason B. Anari, MD; Drew A. Torigian, MA; Patrick J. Cahill, MD, 14th International Congress on Early Onset Scoliosis (2020 ICEOS Virtual Meeting). The abstract was selected for a live oral presentation in the awards section.Nov. 14, 2020.
